import{isSafari}from'react-device-detect';export function getDuration(e,remove){return new Promise(function(resolver){if(e.duration!==Infinity&&(!isSafari||isSafari&&e.duration>0)){resolver(e.duration);return;}e.addEventListener('durationchange',function(){if(remove){e.remove();}else{e.pause();e.volume=1;e.currentTime=0;}resolver(e.duration);});e.currentTime=24*60*60;// Unprobable time
e.play();});}
